    • Method Detail

      • getExtractor

        public gobblin.source.extractor.Extractor<java.lang.String,byte[]> getExtractor(gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState state)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Get an Extractor based on a given WorkUnitState.

        The Extractor returned can use WorkUnitState to store arbitrary key-value pairs that will be persisted to the state store and loaded in the next scheduled job run.

        Parameters:
        state - a WorkUnitState carrying properties needed by the returned Extractor
        Returns:
        an Extractor used to extract schema and data records from the data source
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to create an Extractor
